headline: Happy New Year: Here Are Two Stocks to Watch Going Into 2025
summary: It's still a strategy that consistently produces good results, and is much easier on your mental health than trying to constantly time the market and trade stocks.  It's safe to say that Carnival (NYSE: CCL) absolutely took it in the teeth during the COVID-19 pandemic.  Since then, in conjunction with the stabilization of travel, Carnival has been digging itself out of a hole that no one saw coming.

headline: Jazz Icons Jools Holland OBE and Jamie Cullum Set Sail with Cunard in 2025
summary: VALENCIA, Calif- Cunard is setting the tempo for music collaborations in 2025 with globally renowned jazz artists Jools Holland OBE and Jamie Cullum* headlining exclusive performances on board Queen...

headline: It’s the Time for Cruise Deals. Here’s How to Maximize Your Trip.
summary: The beginning of the year is generally the best time to book a cruise vacation, thanks to the promotions different cruise lines offer during what cruise veterans call wave season.  The wave season, roughly between Christmas and early March, is when cruise lines traditionally have marketed the biggest bargains on upcoming voyages.  The post-Covid surge in cruise bookings has shown no signs of abating.
